H0.text: The undersurface of a person's foot or of a shoe. Heel

H1.text: The undersurface of a person's foot or of a shoe. Arch

H2.text: The undersurface of a person's foot or of a shoe. Toe

H3.text: The undersurface of a person's foot or of a shoe. Sole

A4.text: The sole of the foot is anatomically referred to as the plantar aspect.

A5.text: The sole contains the thickest layers of skin on the body due to the weight that is continually placed on it.
